CLOSE_TAG_FOR_VOID_ELEMENT: The closing </[[closeTag.name]]> tag here is for a void element (that is, an element that doesn't need to be closed).
CSS_MIXED_ACTIVECONTENT: The css property [[cssProperty.property]] has a url() value here that links to an HTTP resource, but the page itself is hosted on HTTPS. Most browsers will not be able to load this resource because of mixed-content restrictions. You will have to link to an HTTPS resource for it to be loaded in your CSS.
EVENT_HANDLER_ATTR_NOT_ALLOWED: Sorry, but security restrictions on this site prevent you from using the JavaScript event handler attribute here. If you really need to use JavaScript, consider using jsbin or jsfiddle.
HTML_CODE_IN_CSS_BLOCK: HTML code was detected in CSS context starting here
HTTP_LINK_FROM_HTTPS_PAGE: The <[[openTag.name]]> tag's [[attribute.name.value]] attribute points to a HTTP resource here, but the page itself is hosted on HTTPS. Most browsers will not be able to load this resource because of mixed-content restrictions. Either point to an HTTPS resource, or include the data as content in an on-page <[[openTag.name]]> element instead.
INVALID_CSS_PROPERTY_NAME: [[cssProperty.property]] is not a valid CSS property.
CSS property [[cssProperty.property]] does not exist. You may want to see a list of CSS properties.
INVALID_CSS_RULE: This CSS rule is not legal CSS.
INVALID_TAG_NAME:
The < character here appears to be the beginning of a tag, but is not followed by a valid tag name.

If you just want a < to appear on your Web page, try using < instead.

Or, see a list of HTML5 tags.
JAVASCRIPT_URL_NOT_ALLOWED: Sorry, but security restrictions on this site prevent you from using the javascript: URL here. If you really need to use JavaScript, consider using jsbin or jsfiddle.
MISMATCHED_CLOSE_TAG: The closing </[[closeTag.name]]> tag here doesn't pair with the opening <[[openTag.name]]> tag here.
MISSING_CSS_BLOCK_CLOSER: Missing block closer or next property:value; pair following [[cssValue.value]].
MISSING_CSS_SELECTOR: Missing either a new CSS selector or the </style> tag here.
SCRIPT_ELEMENT_NOT_ALLOWED: Sorry, but security restrictions on this site prevent you from using <script> tags here. If you really need to use JavaScript, consider using jsbin or jsfiddle.
SELF_CLOSING_NON_VOID_ELEMENT: The <[[name]]> tag here can't be self-closed, because <[[name]]> is not a void element; it must be closed with a separate </[[name]]> tag.
UNCAUGHT_CSS_PARSE_ERROR: A parse error occurred outside expected cases: [[error.msg]]
UNEXPECTED_CLOSE_TAG: The closing </[[closeTag.name]]> tag here doesn't pair with anything, because there are no opening tags that need to be closed.
UNQUOTED_ATTR_VALUE: The Attribute value here should start with an opening double quote.
UNTERMINATED_ATTR_VALUE: The <[[openTag.name]]> tag's [[attribute.name.value]] attribute has a value here that doesn't end with a closing double quote.
UNTERMINATED_CLOSE_TAG: The closing </[[closeTag.name]]> tag here doesn't end with a >.
UNTERMINATED_COMMENT: The comment here doesn't end with a -->.
UNTERMINATED_CSS_COMMENT: The CSS comment here doesn't end with a */.
UNTERMINATED_OPEN_TAG: The opening <[[openTag.name]]> tag here doesn't end with a >.
